pages.title: How to getting fruits
pages.text: To bake yummy dishes you need a lot of ingredients, for example fruits. You can harvest them from tree leaves. There are five fruits to collect.$(br2) $(br2) $(br) $(br2) -->
$(bold)How to get the fruits$()$(br)-plums you get from common oak leaves$(br)-peaches you get from birch leaves$(br)-cherries you get from dark oak leaves$(br)-lemons you get from accacia leaves
